Convert reoperation columns from wide to long format

Source: R/conv_acs.R
make_reop_long.Rd

Convert reoperation columns from wide to long format

make_reop_long(df, removeFALSE = FALSE)

Arguments

df

a data.table

removeFALSE

a logical vector indicating whether or not to remove rows with a FALSE value.

Value

a data.table

Details

The data from the data table is then melted into a long format with caseid as the ID variable to allow rejoining to the main table. After melting, rows with missing values are omitted to reduce the size of the table. Rows where reoperation are false may also be removed with removeFALSE to reduce table size if desired, but note this results in an inability to a clarify a known FALSE ("did not have a reoperation") from a missing value ("do not know if there was a reoperation").

Note that this function does not reorder nreoperation after converting to long and removing records with NA, FALSE, or both. This is because the third reoperation (reoperation3) has significance as representing 3 or more reoperations.

Examples

x <- data.table::data.table(caseid = c(1,2,3,4),
reoperation1 = c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, NA),
retorpodays = c(10, 7, NA, NA),
reoporcpt1 = c("44005", "37211", NA, NA),
retorrelated = c(TRUE, TRUE, NA, NA),
reoporicd91 = c("K56.69","T82.868A", NA, NA),
reopor1icd101 = c("K56.59", "T82.868A", NA, NA),
reoperation2 = c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, NA),
retor2podays = c(10, 7, NA, NA),
reopor2cpt1 = c("44005", "37211", NA, NA),
retor2related = c(TRUE, TRUE, NA, NA),
reopor2icd91 = c("K56.69","T82.868A", NA, NA),
reopor2icd101 = c("K56.59", "T82.868A", NA, NA),
reoperation3 = c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, NA),
retor3podays = c(10, 7, NA, NA),
reopor3cpt1 = c("44005", "37211", NA, NA),
retor3related = c(TRUE, TRUE, NA, NA),
reopor3icd91 = c("K56.69","T82.868A", NA, NA),
reopor3icd101 = c("K56.59", "T82.868A", NA, NA))

nsqipr:::make_reop_long(x)
#>    caseid nreoperation reoperation retorpodays reoporcpt retorrelated
#> 1:      1            1        TRUE          10     44005         TRUE
#> 2:      1            2        TRUE          10     44005         TRUE
#> 3:      1            3        TRUE          10     44005         TRUE
#> 4:      2            1        TRUE           7     37211         TRUE
#> 5:      2            2        TRUE           7     37211         TRUE
#> 6:      2            3        TRUE           7     37211         TRUE
#> 7:      3            1       FALSE          NA      <NA>           NA
#> 8:      3            2       FALSE          NA      <NA>           NA
#> 9:      3            3       FALSE          NA      <NA>           NA
#>    reoporicd9 reoporicd10
#> 1:     K56.69      K56.59
#> 2:     K56.69      K56.59
#> 3:     K56.69      K56.59
#> 4:   T82.868A    T82.868A
#> 5:   T82.868A    T82.868A
#> 6:   T82.868A    T82.868A
#> 7:       <NA>        <NA>
#> 8:       <NA>        <NA>
#> 9:       <NA>        <NA>
nsqipr:::make_reop_long(x, TRUE)
#>    caseid nreoperation reoperation retorpodays reoporcpt retorrelated
#> 1:      1            1        TRUE          10     44005         TRUE
#> 2:      1            2        TRUE          10     44005         TRUE
#> 3:      1            3        TRUE          10     44005         TRUE
#> 4:      2            1        TRUE           7     37211         TRUE
#> 5:      2            2        TRUE           7     37211         TRUE
#> 6:      2            3        TRUE           7     37211         TRUE
#>    reoporicd9 reoporicd10
#> 1:     K56.69      K56.59
#> 2:     K56.69      K56.59
#> 3:     K56.69      K56.59
#> 4:   T82.868A    T82.868A
#> 5:   T82.868A    T82.868A
#> 6:   T82.868A    T82.868A
